content: 2- hour headband by barbara hurd yarn malabrigo nube fiber homespun or any yarn that meets gauge needles 7 us circs gauge 16 sts/4 inches in stockinette st sizes s m l 18 20 22 inch head circumference cast on 72 80 88 sts pm #1 place marker join *k1 p1 for 32 sts pm #2 knit 15 sts in stockinette stitch all knit pm #3 *p1 k1 to the last sts before the marker and p1 continue in *k1 p1 rib and stockinette sts between 2nd and 3rd markers for 2 5 inches or desired width bind off loosely block being sure to tack down the edges of the stockinette rectangle place label when band is dry if desired or add patch embroidery quilting etc stretch it slightly before securing i backed my grommets with a small felt rectangle to secure them i hope you enjoyed making this and will enjoy wearing or gifting it stay warm copyright barbara hurd 2025
